text: No Fear, No Blame () is a 1962 Soviet drama film directed by Aleksandr Mitta.Фильм «Без страха и упрека» Александра Митты покажут на большом экране «Вымпела»Скончался Александр Шейн == Plot == The film tells about the business trip Repnin, which is sent with the equipment to Moscow. Having shipped the equipment, he had to fly to the Bailout, but he lost all his money. Three kids find them and decide to go in search of the owner.Без страха и упрека == Cast == * Alla Vitruk * Viktor Glazkov * Nikolay BurlyaevГлавный сирота советского экрана. Как Николай Бурляев попал в кино * Saveliy Kramarov * Nikolay Volkov * Lev Zolotukhin * Marina Strizhenova * Lyudmila Marchenko * Anatoli Yushko * Yelena Maksimova == References == == External links == * Category:1962 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: No Fear, No Blame
